data.title: Boeing suspends load test on new 777X aircraft & Tesla driver asleep at wheel?
data.text: CNBC's Phil LeBeau reports on Boeing's latest airplane test issue.

data.title: California highway barrier not repaired before fatal Tesla crash
data.text: California state transportation officials failed to repair a highway safety device seriously damaged in a high-speed crash 11 days before a fatal collision in March 2018 involving a Tesla in Autopilot mode, the National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) said Monday.

data.title: California highway barrier repairs 'ineffective' before Tesla crash: NTSB
data.text: The National Transportation Safety Board said Monday that California state transportation officials should ensure timely repairs of highway traffic safety hardware in the aftermath of a March 2018 Tesla crash.

data.title: Elon Musk's Charm Offensive in China Pays Off Amid Trade War
data.text: Elon Musk’s charm offensive in China appears to have paid off.

data.title: Elon Musk pushes new Tesla pickup truck reveal to November
data.text: Yahoo Finance's Pras Subramanian reports on the new Tesla pickup truck and where it stands with the competition.

data.title: More Broken Promises from Tesla
data.text: A decrease in investment helps produce positive cash flow in the short-term, but further decreases the chances of the company justifying its valuation over the long-term.
